original_text:
There were burnt offerings in abundance, together with the fat of the fellowship offerings and the drink offerings that accompanied the burnt offerings.
So the service of the temple of the Lord was reestablished.
korean_text: 번제와 화목제의 기름과 각 번제에 속한 전제들이 많더라 이와 같이 여호와의 전에서 섬기는 일이 순서대로 갖추어지니라

sentences.original_text: There were burnt offerings in abundance
together with the fat of the fellowship offerings
and the drink offerings that accompanied the burnt offerings
So the service of the temple of the Lord
